AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay.synopsis: A flaming fist and harper are keeping guard in the fountain area of haven, talking between themselves without looking at each other. Fist is cynical Harper is more serene/ determined to see things through.

DockGuard_Left_Ranger.synopsis: One of the Harper guards milling around the entrance area of Haven. State nodes for each state in Haven. This Harper talks in a unique way because Common is her seventh language.

FountainGuards_Melee_2.synopsis: Default dialogue for the confident and experienced harper when standing guard at the fountain in haven + being under siege by shadows

BarricadeRunners_Ranger.synopsis: Harper ranger running supplies at the barricade in Haven - has states and hasmets for each of 8 possible states in the area. One-liners for each.

HarperQuartermaster.synopsis: Trader's default dialogue in Haven. Trader is a good Harper and devotee to the cause, worried about what will happen going forward.

AD_BarricadeRunners.synopsis: Two Harpers are fortifying a barricade at Haven to keep shadows out. Grim mood. They're not convinced the barricade is going to keep out the evil that surrounds the inn.

BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf.synopsis: A wood elf standing guard by the Last Light barricades.

DockGuard_Melee.synopsis: This is a guard that patrols the dock in Haven. Mood is generally stalwart. Their dialogue changes depending on Haven's state.

BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf.synopsis: several states of being for a harper guard who is protecting a barricade at the entrance to Last Light.

DockGuard_Ranger.synopsis: Naysa is a very grumpy tiefling with a heart of gold. She takes patrolling very seriously and doesn't appreciate being interrupted. This covers all the main states in Haven.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee.synopsis: Dock guard comments about seeing something beyond the shield.

AD_DockGuard_Ranger.synopsis: Dock guard comments about seeing something beyond the shield.

BarricadeYeller_Ranger.synopsis: A gruff, business-like Harper has short dialogues through a variety of states within the Last Light Inn. This Harper is typically outside the inn performing guard and other duties.

DockGuard_Left_Melee.synopsis: Teebes is an older dwarf and a poet at heart. He speaks in soothing tones and has a calming nature. He has been a Harper for longer than most people have been alive. This dialogue covers all major states in Haven.
DockGuard_Left_Melee.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to Haven2. Talk to Teebs

FountainGuards_ThreeWay.synopsis: Two guards standing by a fountain, one a long-lived gnome Harper and one a rough-and-ready Flaming Fist human. The Fist is on edge and none too friendly, the Harper is calmer and more forthcoming.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf.synopsis: Tumeril is young for a High Elf but passionate about the Harper cause. He is formal, but sincere in his concern for the player, and the fight to free this land from the Darkness. And experienced practioner of magic, he is prepared to lay down his life for the cause if needs be.This dialogue covers all his main states in the Last Light Inn. His default state is outside the tavern doors, keeping a lookout. He is a backup for the main quest, and will point the player towards the comatose Art Cullagh, who is pivotal to lifting the curse on the shadowlands.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf.how_to_trigger: Backup state (pointing you to art cullagh): Teleport to act 2, after the checkpoint. Speak to Tumeril, who is just outside the entrance to Art Cullagh's room.

AD_QuartermasterReport.synopsis: Harper Callie talks to Quartermaster Talli about the supply situation.

AD_JaheiraReport.synopsis: Harper Callie reports to Jaheira about a variety of things.

RoofWatcher_Caster.synopsis: A mage that keeps watch from the roof of Last Light. Reacts differently depending on Haven's current state.

FountainPatrol_Caster.synopsis: Random Harper. Small default dialogue during all haven states. This Harper is a bit younger and cheekier than the rest.

FountainGuards_Melee_1.synopsis: Terse, no-nonsense flaming Fist guard's one-liner default dialogue, for each state in Haven. Guard is at a fountain near the entrance of Haven.

EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee.synopsis: Callie is a Harper and a dwarf. Small but vicious, she is a cheerful person who doesn't hesitate to get her hands dirty. She believes ketheric should die for his crimes.The below dialogue covers all her major states, including the attack on last light, etc.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_2.speaker: Fist Ulthred
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_2.text: This place gives me the creeps.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_4.speaker: Harper Essius
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_4.text: Seen alleyways in Baldur's Gate that are plenty worse in their way.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_12.speaker: Harper Essius
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_12.text: Heapside narrows at night time? Two steps in and you're likely to become some dagger's new sheath.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_10.speaker: Fist Ulthred
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_10.text: Ain't my neck of the woods.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_6.speaker: Harper Essius
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_6.text: Duke Ravengard's still alive, you reckon?

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_7.speaker: Fist Ulthred
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_7.text: He better be, or I'm a dead man walking.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_5.speaker: Fist Ulthred
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_5.text: Not as long as we can put up a fight, we're not.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_9.speaker: Harper Essius
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_9.context: NodeContext: Mischief in his voice. He's messing with the FF.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_13.speaker: Fist Ulthred
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_13.text: I wish we'd gear up and head out. All this standing around is making me antsy.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_11.speaker: Harper Essius
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_11.text: Got to have a plan first. Got to trust Jaheira to come up with one.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_3.speaker: Fist Ulthred
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_3.context: NodeContext: In response to 'Oh?' A confirmation, not a realization.

AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_8.speaker: Fist Ulthred
AD_FountainGuards_ThreeWay_8.text: That's why we're still standing around.

DockGuard_Left_Ranger_0.speaker: Harper Lymn
DockGuard_Left_Ranger_0.text: Be safe. Stay in the light.
DockGuard_Left_Ranger_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

DockGuard_Left_Ranger_1.speaker: Harper Lymn
DockGuard_Left_Ranger_1.text: The Flaming Fist - I felt it. Something wrong. But betrayal? A surprise.
DockGuard_Left_Ranger_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

DockGuard_Left_Ranger_2.speaker: Harper Lymn
DockGuard_Left_Ranger_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

DockGuard_Left_Ranger_3.speaker: Harper Lymn
DockGuard_Left_Ranger_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FountainGuards_Melee_2_0.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_Melee_2_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

FountainGuards_Melee_2_1.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_Melee_2_1.text: With Jaheira to lead us, and you bringing light to the shadows, we might just have a chance.

FountainGuards_Melee_2_2.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_Melee_2_2.text: The Flaming Fist may be a bit rough, but I've respected them. Didn't expect a traitor in their ranks.
FountainGuards_Melee_2_2.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FountainGuards_Melee_2_3.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_Melee_2_3.text: Jaheira will see us through this matter. She always does.
FountainGuards_Melee_2_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

FountainGuards_Melee_2_4.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_Melee_2_4.text: Let us pray we've had our last surprise.
FountainGuards_Melee_2_4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

AD_DockGuard_Ranger_InCombat_0.speaker: Harper Naysa
AD_DockGuard_Ranger_InCombat_0.text: Your penance will be paid now.

BarricadeRunners_Ranger_0.speaker: Harper Antony
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_0.text: Hope you know what you're doing, walking around with that thing behind your eye.
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: Bit wary of you

BarricadeRunners_Ranger_1.speaker: Harper Antony
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_1.text: Hope you're the praying sort. We need all the help we can get.
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

BarricadeRunners_Ranger_2.speaker: Harper Antony
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_2.text: Never thought I'd see the day Jaheira shows mercy to a True Soul. Or - whatever it is you are.
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

BarricadeRunners_Ranger_3.speaker: Harper Antony
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_3.text: Don't know if we'll survive another attack. We need to get out of here soon as we can.
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

BarricadeRunners_Ranger_4.speaker: Harper Antony
BarricadeRunners_Ranger_4.text: Heard about what happened with Marcus. Guess you really aren't like the rest of 'em. Strange bloody times.

AD_HarperQuartermaster_InCombat_0.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
AD_HarperQuartermaster_InCombat_0.text: The Absolute will not win this day.

HarperQuartermaster_5.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
HarperQuartermaster_5.text: Should've trusted my instincts about that Fist. Knew there was something off about him, but I just... let it go.

HarperQuartermaster_6.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
HarperQuartermaster_6.text: I sold a pair of boots to that traitor. Can't believe it.
HarperQuartermaster_6.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

HarperQuartermaster_7.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
HarperQuartermaster_7.text: If you're all right by Jaheira, you're all right by me.

HarperQuartermaster_10.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
HarperQuartermaster_10.text: See if there's anything you need. We don't know when the next blow might land.
HarperQuartermaster_10.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

HarperQuartermaster_12.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
HarperQuartermaster_12.text: Stock up while you can. I only hope I've brought enough to see us through.

HarperQuartermaster_8.speaker: Player
HarperQuartermaster_8.text: Anything I could take off your hands at no cost to myself?

HarperQuartermaster_3.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
HarperQuartermaster_3.text: Huh. I would've had something for you, but it seems to have up and disappeared. Sorry.

HarperQuartermaster_15.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
HarperQuartermaster_15.text: Sorry; if it costs me, it costs you.

AD_BarricadeRunners_3.speaker: Harper Antony
AD_BarricadeRunners_3.text: Here, and there's more where that came from.

AD_BarricadeRunners_5.speaker: Harper Donner
AD_BarricadeRunners_5.text: Wish we had stone - or steel.

AD_BarricadeRunners_1.speaker: Harper Antony
AD_BarricadeRunners_1.text: I wish we had a bloody army.

AD_BarricadeRunners_6.speaker: Harper Donner
AD_BarricadeRunners_6.text: It ain't pretty, but it can take a beating.

AD_BarricadeRunners_0.speaker: Harper Antony
AD_BarricadeRunners_0.text: It'll need to. Cleric's magic won't hold out the darkness forever.

AD_BarricadeRunners_10.speaker: Harper Antony
AD_BarricadeRunners_10.context: NodeContext: adding to the barricade - gods' blood is a curse

AD_BarricadeRunners_9.speaker: Harper Antony
AD_BarricadeRunners_9.text: I bet they're close. Watching us.

BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_0.speaker: Harper Elifer
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_0.text: You were good to give the lie to Marcus' deception. Who knows what he might've done.

BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_1.speaker: Harper Elifer
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_1.text: Don't look into the shadows too long - feels like the dark's eaten into my soul.
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_2.speaker: Harper Elifer
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_2.text: No one's getting past me. Not again.
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_2.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_3.speaker: Harper Elifer
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_3.text: Think staring out into the dark so much is doing something to my eyes.
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_4.speaker: Harper Elifer
BarricadeGuards_Caster_WoodElf_4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

DockGuard_Melee_0.speaker: Harper Hangfar
DockGuard_Melee_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

DockGuard_Melee_1.speaker: Harper Hangfar
DockGuard_Melee_1.text: You were the one who took down Marcus, yeah? Nasty work.
DockGuard_Melee_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

DockGuard_Melee_2.speaker: Harper Hangfar
DockGuard_Melee_2.text: You look well-equipped. Good. You wouldn't believe the state of some of these lads.
DockGuard_Melee_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

DockGuard_Melee_3.speaker: Harper Hangfar
DockGuard_Melee_3.text: I played cards with Marcus. I thought we were friends.
DockGuard_Melee_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_0.speaker: Harper Darragh
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_0.text: Don't stand too close - you might be contagious.
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: wary of the player

BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_1.speaker: Harper Darragh
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_1.text: They'll be back, and there'll be more of them. There always are...
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: pensive

BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_2.speaker: Harper Darragh
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_2.text: I owed Marcus five rounds. Thanks for settling my debt.
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_2.context: NodeContext: player killed marcus - gallows humour

BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_3.speaker: Harper Darragh
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_3.text: If Jaheira trusts you, I trust you. But I'll be damned if a bug-brain doesn't creep me out.
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: wary of the player

BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_4.speaker: Harper Darragh
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_4.text: Undead coming out of the dark... What a hellhole this is.
BarricadeGuards_Melee_Dwarf_4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: bitter

EntranceGuards_AD_Halfling_Melee_Jaheira.speaker: Harper Callie
EntranceGuards_AD_Halfling_Melee_Jaheira.text: An affront to the High Harper will be paid in blood.

DockGuard_Ranger_0.speaker: Harper Naysa
DockGuard_Ranger_0.text: You need something, ask Jaheira. I'm on duty.
DockGuard_Ranger_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: Grumpy - focused on patrolling

DockGuard_Ranger_1.speaker: Harper Naysa
DockGuard_Ranger_1.text: My eyes can't be everywhere. Be careful who you choose to watch your back.
DockGuard_Ranger_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Gruff but concern for the player hidden underneath.

DockGuard_Ranger_2.speaker: Harper Naysa
DockGuard_Ranger_2.text: Get the hint, mate. I don't have time for a chat.
DockGuard_Ranger_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Grumpy - focused on patrolling

DockGuard_Ranger_3.speaker: Harper Naysa
DockGuard_Ranger_3.text: Shadows on the outside, traitors on the inside... best steer clear of them Flaming Fists, all right?
DockGuard_Ranger_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Gruff but concern for the player hidden underneath.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_5.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_5.text: Cleric seems to know what she's about.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_4.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_4.text: Wonder what those shadows used to be.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_7.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_7.text: Maybe they can still be saved.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_6.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_6.text: Cleric might know. I should ask.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_8.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_8.text: Won't be sorry to see the back of this place.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_1.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_1.text: But not 'til our job here's done.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_11.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_11.text: Now I lay my heart to rest...

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_2.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_2.text: ...I pray Chauntea this land to bless.

AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_9.speaker: Harper Lymn
AD_DockGuard_Left_Melee_9.text: If anyone needs it, it's you.

BarricadeYeller_Ranger_0.speaker: Harper Donner
BarricadeYeller_Ranger_0.text: Called out your buddy, but he seemed to get away without a scratch. You can't pull the wool over my eyes.

BarricadeYeller_Ranger_1.speaker: Harper Donner
BarricadeYeller_Ranger_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

BarricadeYeller_Ranger_2.speaker: Harper Donner
BarricadeYeller_Ranger_2.text: I knew there was something off about that Fist. Glad you were here to take him down.
BarricadeYeller_Ranger_2.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

BarricadeYeller_Ranger_3.speaker: Harper Donner
BarricadeYeller_Ranger_3.text: Jaheira seems sure of you. I hope she's right. This barricade might keep the shadows out, but it won't help against what's already inside.
BarricadeYeller_Ranger_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

BarricadeYeller_Ranger_4.speaker: Harper Donner
BarricadeYeller_Ranger_4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

DockGuard_Left_Melee_0.speaker: Harper Teebs
DockGuard_Left_Melee_0.text: Speak to Isobel, if you haven't. Never met a soul like her in all my days.
DockGuard_Left_Melee_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

DockGuard_Left_Melee_1.speaker: Harper Teebs
DockGuard_Left_Melee_1.text: Look after you and yours. We've lost too many good souls as it is.
DockGuard_Left_Melee_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: warmth and concern

DockGuard_Left_Melee_2.speaker: Harper Teebs
DockGuard_Left_Melee_2.text: Nice to see the dark's spitting out more than shadows. Welcome.
DockGuard_Left_Melee_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: warmth in his voice - glad to see a friendly face

DockGuard_Left_Melee_3.speaker: Harper Teebs
DockGuard_Left_Melee_3.text: There's a crackle in the air - in the darkness. More surprises coming. Be careful.
DockGuard_Left_Melee_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: contemplative

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_0.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_0.text: Hey. That's close enough. You ain't no Harper and you ain't no Fist. Don't need the likes of you crashing our party.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_20.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_20.text: Give it a rest, Ulthred. We need all the godsdamned help we can get.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_33.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_33.text: What party is it that I'm crashing?

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_41.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_41.text: I expected a bit more decorum from a Flaming Fist soldier.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_47.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_47.text: Want me to shine your boots while I'm at it?

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_48.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_48.text: Easy. He's a bit on edge since the, uh... incident.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_23.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_23.text: A bit on edge, my arse!

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_30.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_30.text: Not that you'll give a triple-shat damn, but we were ambushed by them bloody cultists.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_6.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_6.text: Bastards torched the pig-sty we were staying in and made off with the Grand Duke of Baldur's Gate himself.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_51.speaker: Wyll
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_51.text: The Absolute's taken him, then - no question about it.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_25.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_25.text: A rescue party sounds right up my alley as a matter of fact.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_3.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_3.text: If you're serious, go talk to his aide, Florrick. She's inside, 'strategising'.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_34.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_34.text: Say no more. Saving dukes is one of my specialties.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_42.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_42.text: I was there in the aftermath. I don't suppose Counsellor Florrick made it all the way here?

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_44.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_44.text: Sure did, for all the good that does us.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_1.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_1.text: She's inside - one of the ground floor chambers.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_36.speaker: Wyll
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_36.text: Come on. We need to talk to Florrick.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_49.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_49.text: Guess you need to be a godsdamned counsellor to get room and board around here.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_39.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_39.text: So what are you standing around here for?

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_46.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_46.text: Because my bath hasn't run yet, why do you think?

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_26.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_26.text: We're waiting for orders. Jaheira's and the counsellor's. Florrick is Ravengard's political advisor - and sore as a snakebite about losing him, too.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_22.speaker: Wyll
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_22.text: Florrick's here? Where can I find her?
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Said to the Flaming Fist, not the player.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_32.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_32.text: Well - good luck with all that.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_10.speaker: Harper Essius
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_10.text: Shut up. And you, keep walking.
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_10.context: NodeContext: The 'shut up' is aimed at Ulthred - 'And you, keep walking' is at the player. Both Ulthred and the player behaved antagonistically towards one another.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_7.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_7.text: Ah the Flaming Fist. You don't like people like me, do you?

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_11.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_11.context:
CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Ulthred keeps looking you in the eyes and smiles before he speaks.
NodeContext: Ulthred keeps looking you in the eyes and smiles before he speaks with menace.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_16.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_16.text: Good. Wouldn't want to piss on the wrong grave come the morrow.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_37.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_37.text: I usually say 'The Dark Urge', but I've been workshopping 'The Sleepless Knife' and 'The Death Dream'.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_2.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_2.text: Good. Wouldn't want to get it wrong in your eulogy.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_5.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_5.text: Nah. Mind flayers don't really have names.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_28.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_28.text: Move along, godsdammit. Bloody freaks everywhere.
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_28.context:
CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) He’s genuinely taken aback by the player’s response and takes a step back. He’s afraid.
NodeContext: He’s genuinely taken aback by the player’s response and takes a step back. He’s afraid.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_27.speaker: Player
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_27.text: Don't worry - I'm used to pricks in a uniform being rude.

FountainGuards_ThreeWay_8.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_ThreeWay_8.text: Hey. That's close enough. Artefact or no, I don't like the likes of you crashing our party.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_0.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_0.text: Best head inside. There's food and warmth to spare.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_0.context: NodeContext: Concern. You want the player to be safe.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_6.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_6.text: The Harpers won't let you down.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_7.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_7.text: Not another ward, I hope? I'm better at subterfuge and spellcasting than babysitting.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_7.context: NodeContext: his delivery is serious but a slight smile betrays that he is joking

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_12.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_12.text: Wouldn't I like to know. I've asked the fellow many times, but he's not in a talking mood.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_12.context: NodeContext: sigh, he's worried about his charge

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_3.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_3.text: Wish the fellow inside could say the same.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_3.context: NodeContext: sigh, he's worried about his charge

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_29.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_29.text: Judging by his uniform he's someone of import - he was here, fresh from the shadows, when Isobel banished the curse here.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_29.context: NodeContext: concerned he wishes he could do more to help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_26.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_26.text: Jaheira warned the others to steer clear, hence why I'm on door duty. You, on the other hand...
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_26.context: NodeContext: concerned he wishes he could do more to help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_28.speaker: Player
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_28.text: I've tried waking him - to no avail.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_9.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_9.context: NodeContext: concerned, he was hoping the player could help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_19.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_19.text: I pray that when we're done with Ketheric, we'll have time for him.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_19.context: NodeContext: concerned he wishes he could do more to help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_13.speaker: Player
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_13.text: He's comatose. You should put him out of his misery.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_11.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_11.text: If that were the Harper way, I wouldn't be standing here.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_11.context: NodeContext: serious - player just suggested he hurt someone. He would never do so without cause.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_14.speaker: Player
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_14.text: I'm not taking over for you.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_5.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_5.text: I'll not abandon my post. But it might be a friendly face could rouse the poor fellow.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_5.context: NodeContext: concerned for his charge, hoping the player can help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_2.speaker: Player
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_2.text: Why steer clear? Is he dangerous?

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_1.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_1.text: Don't think so, but we don't really know one way or the other. Better safe than sorry, Jaheira'd say.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_1.context: NodeContext: concerned for his charge, hoping the player can help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_4.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_4.text: He clearly needs help, but we're stretched thin as is. He's just inside, if you want to give him a once-over.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_4.context: NodeContext: concerned for his charge, hoping the player can help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_24.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_24.text: Trot on if you want, or you could see if a friendly face'd do him any good.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_24.context: NodeContext: concerned for his charge, hoping the player can help

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_16.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_16.text: Fellow inside could probably use a bit more attention, but I'm more concerned with shadows at the gate, frankly.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_16.context: NodeContext: sigh, he's worried about his charge

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_10.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_10.text: It's not the shadows or its curse that scare me - it's seeing Lady Jaheira so worried.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_10.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.NodeContext: Fearful but doing your best to be strong.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_15.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_15.text: I need to focus on the front - hopefully you and our friend inside are getting on well.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_17.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_17.text: I'd not tarry out here were I you.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_17.context: NodeContext: Concern. You want the player to be safe.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_18.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_18.text: I'd rather face Ketheric's armies than suffer traitors. Watch out for those Flaming Fist.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_18.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Fearful. Maudlin.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_22.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_22.text: I question who is really on our side. Give me no reason to doubt you.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_22.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Fearful. Maudlin.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_23.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_23.text: Be ready for anything at Moonrise - Ketheric won't go down easy.

EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_27.speaker: Harper Tumeril
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_27.text: My hands might be trembling, but don't worry - I'll protect this place with my life.
EntranceGuards_Caster_HighElf_27.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.NodeContext: Darkness on all sides. You're doing your best to be strong.

AD_QuartermasterReport_3.speaker: Harper Callie
AD_QuartermasterReport_3.text: Jaheira wants to know about supplies. Will we make it home?

AD_QuartermasterReport_0.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
AD_QuartermasterReport_0.text: Burning through our oil, but it should just about do.

AD_QuartermasterReport_2.speaker: Quartermaster Talli
AD_QuartermasterReport_2.text: Just about. We shouldn't hang around too long, though.

AD_JaheiraReport_3.speaker: Harper Callie
AD_JaheiraReport_3.text: Patrols report more activity among the cultists, ma'am.

AD_JaheiraReport_5.speaker: Harper Callie
AD_JaheiraReport_5.text: Seems someone's been skimming our supplies.

AD_JaheiraReport_8.speaker: Jaheira
AD_JaheiraReport_8.text: Is anyone keeping an eye on those children from Elturel?

AD_JaheiraReport_2.speaker: Jaheira
AD_JaheiraReport_2.text: Find out who it is. And bring them to me.

AD_JaheiraReport_1.speaker: Jaheira
AD_JaheiraReport_1.text: Good. We'll leave soon - and we don't want any surprises.

RoofWatcher_Caster_0.speaker: Harper Terradissia
RoofWatcher_Caster_0.text: Did you see the light overhead? Glorious.

RoofWatcher_Caster_1.speaker: Harper Terradissia
RoofWatcher_Caster_1.text: If the cultists try to snatch this place while you're at Moonrise, we'll fight them off.

RoofWatcher_Caster_2.speaker: Harper Terradissia
RoofWatcher_Caster_2.text: I'd rather be up here than drowning in the dark.
RoofWatcher_Caster_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

RoofWatcher_Caster_3.speaker: Harper Terradissia
RoofWatcher_Caster_3.text: Can't trust anyone anymore - and that includes you.
RoofWatcher_Caster_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

RoofWatcher_Caster_4.speaker: Harper Terradissia
RoofWatcher_Caster_4.text: From up here, you can almost pretend Isobel's light is the sun.
RoofWatcher_Caster_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

RoofWatcher_Caster_5.speaker: Harper Terradissia
RoofWatcher_Caster_5.text: Don't get too close to me, all right?
RoofWatcher_Caster_5.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FountainPatrol_Caster_0.speaker: Harper Chenti
FountainPatrol_Caster_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

FountainPatrol_Caster_1.speaker: Harper Chenti
FountainPatrol_Caster_1.text: Didn't take Marcus for a turncoat - though I suppose it wasn't his fault. Cultists got to him, and that's that.

FountainPatrol_Caster_2.speaker: Harper Chenti
FountainPatrol_Caster_2.text: Did you see him? The traitor? Disgusting.
FountainPatrol_Caster_2.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FountainPatrol_Caster_3.speaker: Harper Chenti
FountainPatrol_Caster_3.text: Can't chat - need to reinforce the barricade.
FountainPatrol_Caster_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: curt - you're busy

FountainPatrol_Caster_4.speaker: Harper Chenti
FountainPatrol_Caster_4.text: I knew full well not to trust those Flaming Fist. Jaheira should know better.
FountainPatrol_Caster_4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

AD_DockGuard_Melee_InCombat_0.speaker: Harper Hangfar
AD_DockGuard_Melee_InCombat_0.text: Where do you think you're going?

FountainGuards_Melee_1_0.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_0.text: Thought it was over, but Ketheric's not done yet. Finish him.
FountainGuards_Melee_1_0.context: NodeContext: tired after a fight, but determined to see it through

FountainGuards_Melee_1_1.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_2.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_2.text: Harpers are awfully optimistic about their plans. Ask me - plan for the worst.
FountainGuards_Melee_1_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_3.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Isobel is gone and Shadow Creatures are sieging the Haven. Some NPCs are in the basement.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_4.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_4.text: No more waiting, no more hiding. This is it.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_5.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_5.text: Knew this place would be the death of us.
FountainGuards_Melee_1_5.context: InternalNodeContext: Isobel is gone and Shadow Creatures are sieging the Haven. Some NPCs are in the basement.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_6.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_6.text: Always knew Marcus was a snake. You did well to knock the light out of him.
FountainGuards_Melee_1_6.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_7.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_7.text: Gods, what I wouldn't give to be back in the Gate. Place like this makes you miss home, eh?
FountainGuards_Melee_1_7.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_8.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_8.text: If one of ours was a traitor, one of the Harpers might be too. It's always the do-gooders, isn't it?
FountainGuards_Melee_1_8.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_9.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_9.text: Ready? It's time to take the fight to them.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_10.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_10.text: We wouldn't have made it this far without you.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_11.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_11.text: Can't talk - shades might come clambering over the barricade any time.
FountainGuards_Melee_1_11.context: InternalNodeContext: Siege is over, but Haven doesn't have any protection anymore.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_12.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_12.text: Didn't expect Ketheric to retreat - not sure he has. Could be a trap.

FountainGuards_Melee_1_13.speaker: Fist Ulthred
FountainGuards_Melee_1_13.text: Ketheric's on the back foot. Ready for the final push?

EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_0.speaker: Harper Callie
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_0.text: Keep your eyes sharp out there, yeah?
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: Reassuring and kind

EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_1.speaker: Harper Callie
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_1.text: That traitor Marcus is lucky he didn't run into me - I'd have made him suffer.
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Furious

EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_2.speaker: Harper Callie
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_2.text: Pretty as you are, this is no time for a natter. Head on in to Last Light.
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Cheeky smile, trying to be friendly and uplifting.

EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_3.speaker: Harper Callie
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_3.text: I broke bread with that Flaming Fist - little shit.
EntranceGuards_Halfling_Melee_3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Furious
